org.flowvisor.message.actions

Interface SlicableAction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FVActionDataLayerDestination, FVActionDataLayerSource, FVActionEnqueue, FVActionNetworkLayerDestination, FVActionNetworkLayerSource, FVActionNetworkTypeOfService, FVActionOutput, FVActionStripVirtualLan, FVActionTransportLayerDestination, FVActionTransportLayerSource, FVActionVendor, FVActionVirtualLanIdentifier, FVActionVirtualLanPriorityCodePoint

    Author:
    capveg

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void slice(java.util.List<org.openflow.protocol.action.OFAction> approvedActions, org.openflow.protocol.OFMatch match, WorkerSwitch fvClassifier, OriginalSwitch fvSlicer)
      See if this action is allowed in the slice definition, given this match If yes, then write it to the approvedActions list (possibly rewritten) or expanded

    • Method Detail

      • slice

        void slice(java.util.List<org.openflow.protocol.action.OFAction> approvedActions,
         org.openflow.protocol.OFMatch match,
         WorkerSwitch fvClassifier,
         OriginalSwitch fvSlicer)
           throws ActionDisallowedException
        See if this action is allowed in the slice definition, given this match If yes, then write it to the approvedActions list (possibly rewritten) or expanded
        Parameters:
        approvedActions - list of already approved actions
        match - the context the action is used in ; the inport is set to the inport of the packet_out
        fvClassifier - switch definition
        fvSlicer - slice definition
        Throws:
        if - the action is not allowed
        ActionDisallowedException
